availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: A wealthy Indiana-born farmer. Resided in Mill Creek, Carroll County, Kentucky. Married Mary Ann Gullion.

bibl.p: Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Carroll County, Mill Creek, p. 63.

Find A Grave, Entry for Theodore Wythe Bates (1815-1895), Find A Grave Memorial # 31462564, Carrollton IOOF Cemetery, Carrollton, Carroll County, Kentucky, https://www.findagrave.com/cgi-bin/fg.cgi page=gr&GSln=bates&GSfn=theodore&GSby=1815&GSbyrel=in&GSdy=1895&GSdyrel=in&GSob=n&GRid=31462564&df=all& (accessed 7 May 2017).
